name: Infernal Sin
description:
Year 3 GameDev Project - Won Best Animation, Environment Art and Character Art at the University of Derby GameDev Expo 2019

I'd suggest skipping past the smaller enemies and just killing the bosses as you will likely die due to a near constant respawn.

Artists:
Animator/Rigger - Thomas Greasley
Environment Artist - Darien Harvey
Character Artist - Szymon Klos
Weapon Artist - Frano Marinkovic

Programmers:
Lewis Hobbs
Liam Potter
Andrew Deeble
Piotr Guzowski
Alex Gama
Zachary Brett
Ethan Audley
Jack Audley
